summary: Magicka Robes , Weapons and Staffs + Spells in Skyrim !
descriptionHtml:
I'm a huge fan of magicka and recently thought I'd give this a shot , so I hope you like my creations. I plan to add a couple of extra spells/Magicks in the future , sofar I only got the 8 basic elements , the 2 hidden elements and "no-element". While the staffs and the sword can be forged you'll have to buy the robes from a merchant in the Frozen Hearth , Winterhold's In.

Have fun !

All models in this mod have been created by myself , this does not contain any ported content from any game

-No DLC's required
author: AshuraDX
